quote_text: Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: God does not give us overcoming life; He gives us life as we overcome.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: My worth to God in public is what I am in private.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: The battle is lost or won in the secret places of the will before God, never first in the external world.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: The greatest competitor of devotion to Jesus is service for Him.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: God cannot give us happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: Holiness, not happiness, is the chief end of man.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: The grace of God is the overflowing favour of God; you can always count on it being there to draw upon.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: If you are going to be used by God, He will take you through a multitude of experiences that are not meant for you at all; they are meant to make you useful in His hands.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: The love of God is not a sentimental feeling; it is sovereign and almighty, and will have its way.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote_text: Prayer does not fit us for the greater works; prayer is the greater work.
author: Oswald Chambers
